title: Kona's Song
description: Young wolf Kona has always known he was different. When he comes of age and learns the truth about himself, he sets out on an epic journey that will change his life forever. On his travels he will encounter friends and foes, face natural disasters and the dangers of the hunt, experience love and loss, and struggle to find his place in the pack and in the world. A story of adventure and excitement, grief and joy, courage and self-discovery.
author: Louise Searl
